PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14402018-11-22,  ,  PPC,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation Safety Board Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION SAFETY BOARD REGULATIONS in order to clarify selected reporting provisions and definitions relating to PIPELINE occurrences to address interpretation ambiguities between industry and the TRANSPORTATION SAFETY BOARD, as well as to address minor discrepancies between the English and French texts of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0258 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION SAFETY BOARD REGULATIONS in order to clarify selected reporting provisions and definitions relating to PIPELINE occurrences to address interpretation ambiguities between industry and the TRANSPORTATION SAFETY BOARD, as well as to address minor discrepancies between the English and French texts of the Regulations.
